title: Content Creation Quiz
description: Test your understanding of creating engaging Markdown content

questions.question: Which Markdown syntax creates a code block with syntax highlighting?
questions.explanation: Use triple backticks with the language name (e.g., ```javascript) to create syntax-highlighted code blocks.

questions.question: What is the recommended approach for organizing Markdown files?
options: Put all files in the root docs directory
Organize in numbered directories with descriptive names
Store files outside the docs directory
questions.explanation: Organize files in numbered directories (01_getting-started, 02_basic-usage) with clear, descriptive names for better navigation and maintenance.

questions.question: How should you link to other documents within your content?
questions.explanation: Use relative paths to link between documents, which keeps links working even when the site structure changes or when deployed to different domains.
